name: B.F. Sword
text: 15 Attack damage.

name: Recurve Bow
text: 20% Attack speed.

name: Needlessly Large Rod
text: 20 Spell power.

name: Tear of the Goddess
text: 15 Mana.

name: Chain Vest
text: 25 Armor.

name: Negatron Cloak
text: 25 Magic resist.

name: Giant's Belt
text: 200 Health.

name: Spatula
text: It must do something...

name: Sparring Gloves
text: 10% Crit and +10% Dodge chance.

name: Deathblade
text: Contributing to a kill grants +25 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 1).

name: Giant Slayer
text: Attacks and spells deal 20% bonus damage as true damage. If enemy max Health is over 1750, deal 80% bonus true damage instead.

name: Hextech Gunblade
text: Heal for 35% of all spell damage dealt.

name: Spear of Shojin
text: After casting, wearer gains 18% of its max Mana per attack.

name: Guardian Angel
text: Wearer revives with 400 HP.

name: Bloodthirster
text: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 40% of the damage dealt.

name: Zeke's Herald
text: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Blade of the Ruined King
text: Wearer is also a Blademaster.

name: Infinity Edge
text: [UNIQUE] The holder gains 100% critical hit chance, and 20% bonus critical strike damage.

name: Rapid Firecannon
text: Attack Range is tripled and attacks cannot miss.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
text: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. No stacking limit.

name: Statikk Shiv
text: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 80 magic damage to 3/4/5 ★ enemies.

name: Titan's Resolve
text: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 50 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
text: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
text: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1000/2000/3000 ★ Health aries to continue the fight.

name: Infiltrator's Talons
text: Wearer is also an Infiltrator.

name: Last Whisper
text: Critical hits reduce the target’s Armor by 75% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
text: Sources of ability power are 50% more effective. Factoring this, Rabadon's Deathcap grants a total of +60% AP (40 × 1.5) by itself.

name: Luden's Echo
text: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 200 magic damage.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
text: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250/275/350 ★ damage for 8 seconds.

name: Ionic Spark
text: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

name: Morellonomicon
text: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Battlecast Armor
text: Wearer is also a Battlecast.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
text: The wearer's spells can critically strike and holder gains +20% Critical Strike Damage.

name: Blue Buff
text: [UNIQUE] After casting a spell, set your mana to 20.

name: Frozen Heart
text: Adjacent enemies lose 50% Attack Speed. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

name: Chalice of Power
text: At start of combat, the holder and their left and right neighbors gain 30 AP for 20 seconds.

name: Redemption
text: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

name: Star Guardian's Charm
text: Wearer is also a Star Guardian.

name: Hand Of Justice
text: Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +50% more damage / Basic Attack heal 50 health on Hit

name: Bramble Vest
text: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100/140/200 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum).

name: Sword Breaker
text: 25% chance to disarm for 3 seconds.

name: Red Buff
text: Wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing 10% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 4 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Rebel Medal
text: Wearer is also a Rebel.

name: Shroud of Stillness
text: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast.

name: Dragon's Claw
text: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%.

name: Zephyr
text: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Celestial Orb
text: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

name: Quicksilver
text: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immute to croud control for the first 10 seconds of combat.

name: Warmog's Armor
text: Grants 600 health.

name: Protector's Chestguard
text: Wearer is also a Protector.

name: Trap Claw
text: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec.

name: Force of Nature
text: Gain +1 team size.

name: Dark Star's Heart
text: Wearer is also a Dark Star.

name: Thief's Gloves
text: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots].
